#include <iostream>

// Procedure to find the sum and number of odd numbers 
// Input parameters: integers A, B, C 
// Output parameters: integer S (sum), integer N (number)
void FindOdd(int A, int B, int C, int &S, int &N)
{
    // Initializing variables
    S = 0;
    N = 0;

    // Check if A is odd
    if (A % 2 != 0)
    {
        S += A;
        N++;
    }

    // Check if B is odd
    if (B % 2 != 0)
    {
        S += B;
        N++;
    }

    // Check if C is odd
    if (C % 2 != 0)
    {
        S += C;
        N++;
    }
}

int main()
{
    int A, B, C;
    int S, N;

    // Taking input from user
    std::cout << "Enter three integers: ";
    std::cin >> A >> B >> C;

    // Calling procedure
    FindOdd(A, B, C, S, N);

    std::cout << "Sum of odd numbers = " << S << std::endl;
    std::cout << "Number of odd numbers = " << N << std::endl;

    return 0;
}
